about_the_game:
🚀 Exciting News, Gamers! 🚀

The wait is over! 🎮 AND10 Full Game is officially here! Dive into an electrifying adventure where you take control of AND10, our daring android hero, and switch between two formidable allies during intense battles. 🦾💥

🌍✨ Combat Strategies: Mix up your combat tactics by seamlessly switching between characters. Adapt and overcome oncoming hordes of enemies with unique abilities, ensuring no two battles are ever the same. ⚔️🛡️

🌟⚡Multiplayer version of the game will have maps that feature fast paced team battles and capture the flag.🔥🕹️

🌌🌠 Epic Missions: Travel through mind-bending worlds and Earth's diverse landscapes. Complete critical missions for your creator, experiencing a story that's as immersive as it is thrilling. 📜🛰️

Join the journey, master the combat, and be part of the saga. 🌟⚡

Ready to gear up? Let’s go! 🔥🕹️

🚀 Exciting News, Gamers! 🚀

The wait is over! 🎮 AND10 Full Game is officially here! Dive into an electrifying adventure where you take control of AND10, our daring android hero, and switch between two formidable allies during intense battles. 🦾💥

🌍✨ Combat Strategies: Mix up your combat tactics by seamlessly switching between characters. Adapt and overcome oncoming hordes of enemies with unique abilities, ensuring no two battles are ever the same. ⚔️🛡️

🌟⚡Multiplayer version of the game will have maps that feature fast paced team battles and capture the flag.🔥🕹️

🌌🌠 Epic Missions: Travel through mind-bending worlds and Earth's diverse landscapes. Complete critical missions for your creator, experiencing a story that's as immersive as it is thrilling. 📜🛰️

Join the journey, master the combat, and be part of the saga. 🌟⚡

Ready to gear up? Let’s go! 🔥🕹️
name: AND10

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: intel core i8
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 3080
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Nvidia Virtual Sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: intel core i9
  • Graphics: Nvidia GEforce RTX 4080ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Nvidia Virtual Sound

short_description: The Full campaign of AND10 is a fast paced TPS based in a futuristic version of Tokyo call Neo - Tokyo. From Neo - Tokyo you can travel to far off Alien worlds and meet up with friends to trade or fight off enemies in combat in a variety of cyberpunk themed challenges.
